question.title: Will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran support a deadly attack on Israel by a proxy group before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that a proxy group supported by Iran has carried out an attack within Israel that has resulted in the death of at least five individuals.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran supports a deadly attack on Israel by a proxy group, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body:
This question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that a proxy group supported by Iran has carried out an attack within Israel that has resulted in the death of at least five individuals, and if this leads to an attack attributed to Iran occurring within Israel's borders that has also resulted in the death of at least five individuals.

Resolution criteria for the condition: Resolves Yes if credible reports indicate that a proxy group supported by Iran has carried out an attack within Israel resulting in at least five deaths before May 1, 2024.
Resolution criteria for the outcome: Resolves Yes if credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran has occurred within Israel's borders resulting in at least five deaths before May 1, 2024.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran does not support a deadly attack on Israel by a proxy group, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that a proxy group supported by Iran has carried out an attack within Israel that has resulted in the death of at least five individuals. Additionally, it resolves Yes if credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran support a deadly attack on Israeli targets outside of Israel before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that Iran has provided support for an attack that occurs outside of Israel and has led to the death of at least five individuals.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran supports a deadly attack on Israeli targets outside of Israel, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel?
P_given_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that Iran has provided support for an attack that occurs outside of Israel and has led to the death of at least five individuals. Additionally, this question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran does not support a deadly attack on Israeli targets outside of Israel before May 1, 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that Iran has provided support for an attack that occurs outside of Israel and has led to the death of at least five individuals. Furthermore, this question resolves Yes if, following the same timeframe, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. The resolution criteria for each component are as follows: 
1. Iran must not support a deadly attack on Israeli targets outside of Israel leading to five or more deaths. 
2. Iran must carry out a deadly attack within Israel resulting in five or more deaths.

question.title: Is it expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

Q.title: Will Iran support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024?
Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if there are credible reports of Iranian support for a military operation against Israel that involves substantial resources or coordination, resulting in conflict or escalation, before December 31, 2024.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran's support for a significant military operation against Israel, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if there are credible reports of Iranian support for a military operation against Israel that involves substantial resources or coordination, resulting in conflict or escalation, before December 31, 2024. Additionally, it will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran will not support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will be answered with a **Yes** if there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024. 

Resolution criteria for P: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if there are no credible reports of Iranian support for a military operation against Israel that involves substantial resources or coordination, resulting in conflict or escalation, before December 31, 2024.

Q.title: Will Iran support a proxy group to carry out an attack in Israel before July 2024?
Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if there are credible reports of Iran providing support to a proxy group that carries out an attack inside Israel before July 1, 2024.

P_given_Q.title: Given that Iran supports a proxy group to carry out an attack in Israel before July 2024, is it expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if there are credible reports of Iran providing support to a proxy group that carries out an attack inside Israel before July 1, 2024. Additionally, this question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran does not support a proxy group to carry out an attack in Israel before July 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will be answered with a Yes if there are no credible reports of Iran providing support to a proxy group that carries out an attack inside Israel before July 1, 2024. Then, it will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

Resolution criteria: 
1. Iran must not support a proxy group to carry out an attack in Israel before July 2024. 
2. There must be credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people before May 1, 2024.
